resources.string: Tilt your phone sideways to aim for your shot. More inclination means more rotation speed.
Then, just press the screen to shoot the ball. The longer you press, the faster it goes! Release the screen off the button to cancel the shot
You still haven\'t scored any balls.

This app was designed for a project called "LPOOL", developed for the course "Object Oriented Programming Laboratory" of the Faculty of Engineering of the University of Porto. This app is a client app, developed alongside a Java server application for PC. To download this or the server app please visit lpool.pt.vu.
